REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0455 reute r f BC-PENNEY-<JCP>-TO-SELL 03-05 0097

TEXT.TITLE: PENNEY <JCP> TO SELL TELEMARKETING SERVICES
TEXT.BODY: J.C. Penney Co said it will sell telemarketing services to other companies through a newly established wholly-owned subsidiary, Telemarketing Network Inc. The New York-based subsidiary will use a network of 14 telemarketing centers Penney has already established. The centers are part of its catalog marketing operation. A large domestic motel chain already uses the network for its reservations services, Penney said. Frank Engels, director of telemarketing, was named chairman of the new subsidiary. Reuter
